newsitem.title: UK: DHL /Sun Courier form S African alliance.
newsitem.headline: DHL /Sun Courier form S African alliance.

text.p: Sun Couriers and DHL International have set up a new alliance in South Africa to cover both domestic and international package delivery markets, said Torn Plummer, managing director of DHL South Africa
The new alliance started on July one and comes as United Parcel Service is establishing its own operation in South Africa after ending a long-standing partnership with Sun.
"All international traffic generated by Sun Courier's client base will enter our global network as DHL shipments, but monitored and billed by Sun Couriers," said Plummer in a statement.

DHL is continuing its own services in South Africa using its own offices but Sun will act as delivery partner for DHL shipments destined for other locations in the 450 town Sun Couriers domestic network.
The two companies' cross-border, regional services will also be refined.
"We will continue to operate Sun Couriers' independent facilities to the neighbouring States...but merging these operations with DHL where it makes sense," said Sun Couriers director Peter Biker.

The two companies information technology systems will be used jointly to provide information to users, allowing access to the full range of destinations and services that are available through Sun and DHL combined"
No formal plans have yet been made for a close relationship. - Reuters Air Cargo Service Tel+ 44 171 542 7706 Fax +5017 - www.racs.com
